Name: Falling Blocks
About the game: The title says it all. Take a piece of puzzle game block, combine a part of the old-school platform game, add a couple of thousand pixels, mix and serve. Your goal is to survive as long as possible. Play with your friends at home, in duo, or play in singleplayer, whoever gets the highest score will win!
